src:
Ko‘hna Samarqand mezbonlik qilgan xalqaro yarim marafondan “Daryo” fotoreportaji

03 Nov 2019, 23:20

Samarqand shahri 3-noyabr, yakshanba kuni O‘zbekistondagi ilk Xalqaro xayriya yarim marafoniga mezbonlik qildi.


Foto: “Daryo”

Marafon yo‘lagi Samarqand shahrining markaziy ko‘chalaridan o‘tadi. Yugurishga Registon maydoni yonida start berilib, finishi chizig‘i ham xuddi shu yerdan kesib o‘tildi, deb xabar beradi “Daryo” muxbiri.
Yo‘nalish Xalqaro marafonlar va yugurishlar assotsiatsiyasi (AIMS) tomonidan tasdiqlangan.
21,1 kilometr yo‘nalishining o‘lchab chiqilishi AIMS’ning sertifikatlangan o‘lchagichi yordamida amalga oshirildi.
Musobaqada 12 yoshdan boshlab 2 kilometrgacha, 16 yoshdan boshlab 10 kilometrgacha va 18 yoshdan boshlab 21 kilometrgacha ishtirokchilar qatnashdi.
G‘oliblar ro‘yxati bilan tanishing:


Foto: “Daryo”

2 kilometr

1-o‘rin. Xurshid Ahmadaliyev
2-o‘rin. Humoyon Mahmudov
3-o‘rin . Muhsinjon Abdulatipov

10 kilometr

1-o‘rin. Dmitriy Ivanchutsov
2-o‘rin. Yevgeniy Fadeyev
3-o‘rin. Mixail Krassilov

21-kilometr

1-o‘rin. Shohrux Davlatov
2-o‘rin. Andrey Petrov
3-o‘rin. Bekzod Safarov

Ta’kidlash joiz, yarim marafondan tushgan mablag‘lar Toshkent teatrlaridan birida ko‘rish qobiliyati zaif va ko‘zi ojiz insonlar uchun qulay muhit yaratish bo‘yicha eksperimental loyihani amalga oshirishga yo‘naltiriladi. Ushbu dastur tifloizohlash (audiodeskripsiya) yordamida pyesani teatr sahnasida namoyish etilishini o‘z ichiga oladi.

text:
Photo courtesy of the international half marathon hosted by Ancient Samarkand

03 Nov 2019, 23:20

Samarkand hosts the first international charity marathon in Uzbekistan on Sunday, November 3.


Photo: River

Marathon corridor passes through the central streets of Samarkand. The race was started near Registan Square and the finish line was cut off from the same area, the river's correspondent reports.
The route is approved by the International Association of Marathons and Runners (AIMS).
The 21.1 kilometer route was made using a AIMS certified meter.
From 12 to 2 kilometers, from 16 to 10 kilometers and from 18 to 21 kilometers.
See the list of winners:


Photo: River

2 kilometers

1st place. Xurshid Ahmadaliyev
2nd place. Humoyon Mahmudov
3rd place. Muhsinjon Abdulatipov

10 kilometers

1st place. Dmitry Ivanchutsov
2nd place. Yevgeniy Fadeev
3rd place. Mikhail Krassilov

21 miles

1st place. Shohruh Davlatov
2nd place. Andrey Petrov
3rd place. Bekzod Safarov

The proceeds from the half marathon will go toward an experimental project to create an environment for visually impaired and visually impaired people in one of Tashkent's theaters. This program includes theatrical presentation of the play using audio decoding (audio codec).
